comment.text: The translation key "idpSignExitRequest" is used to describe a checkbox label in the Single Sign On settings page. It prompts the user to verify logout requests and sign out of the IdP system. This text appears on a checkbox input field with a disabled state, indicating that it's part of a set of options related to signing out from an Identity Provider (IdP).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Çıxış İstəkləri İşarəsini Təsdiqləyin" is not the most natural or accurate translation of 'Verify Logout Requests Sign'. While technically correct, 'işarəsini' implies a signature, which isn't the intended meaning of 'sign' in this context.  The English phrase refers to validating the request itself.

The translation "Потвърждение на подписа за заявки за отписване" doesn't fully capture the meaning of 'Verify Logout Requests Sign'. 'Sign' in this context likely refers to a digital signature or verification process, not a literal signature. The translation is too literal and lacks clarity.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Преглед на заявки за отписване и потвърждаване на подписите

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Podpis žádostí o ověření odhlášení' doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'Verify Logout Requests Sign'. 'Podpis' (signature) is not the correct term in this context. It implies signing a request, not verifying it.

The translation "Signatur von Logout-Anfragen prüfen" could be improved. While technically correct, "Signatur" (signature) might be misinterpreted.  "Logout-Anfragen prüfen" is accurate in conveying the action but "Signatur" is unnecessary and potentially confusing in this context. It's more common and understandable to focus on the verification process itself.
The translation lacks parallelism with the English title. 'Verify' translates well to a more active verb.

The translation 'Υπογραφή αιτημάτων επαλήθευσης αποσύνδεσης' is a literal translation of 'Verify Logout Requests Sign'. The English phrase 'Verify Logout Requests Sign' implies verifying the signature on logout requests. A more accurate translation would convey the idea of 'verifying the signatures on logout requests'.

While technically not incorrect, the Greek translation 'Υπογραφή αιτημάτων επαλήθευσης αποσύνδεσης' sounds slightly awkward in Greek. Placing 'επαλήθευσης' (verification) after 'αιτημάτων' (requests) is less common.

The English phrase 'Verify Logout Requests Sign' is a bit awkward. A more natural translation of 'Verify Logout Requests' would be 'Verificar Solicitudes de Cierre de Sesión'.  The 'Sign' portion is unnecessary and confusing in this context. 'Firma' usually refers to a signature, not the request itself.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Verificar Solicitudes de Cierre de Sesión

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Ստուգեք Դուրս գալու խնդրանքի նշանը' is a literal translation and doesn't convey the intended meaning of 'Verify Logout Requests Sign' accurately. 'Sign' in this context likely refers to a signature or authentication token, not a physical mark. A more accurate translation would focus on verifying the authentication aspect of the logout request.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like 'Ստուգեք Դուրս գալու հաստատման ցուցիչը' (Check the Logout Authorization Indicator) or 'Ստուգեք Դուրս գալու աջակցության ծածկագիրը' (Check the Logout Support Code). A more colloquial but potentially acceptable translation could be 'Ստուգեք Դուրս գալու ապացույցը' (Check the Logout Proof).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Verifica il segno delle richieste di disconnessione' is not an accurate translation of 'Verify Logout Requests Sign'. 'Segno' translates to 'sign' or 'mark' and doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'Verify'.

The translation "ログアウトリクエスト署名の確認" is a literal translation, but a more natural and accurate phrasing would be "ログアウトリクエストの署名検証" or "ログアウトリクエストの署名確認". While understandable, the original phrasing feels somewhat stiff in Japanese.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ログアウトリクエストの署名検証

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation '로그아웃 요청 서명 확인' is a literal translation of 'Verify Logout Requests Sign'. A more natural and accurate translation of 'Verify Logout Requests Sign' would be '로그아웃 요청 서명 확인' or '로그아웃 요청 서명 검증'. The original English implies verification or validation.

The translation "ຢືນຢັນການຮ້ອງຂໍອອກຈາກລະບົບ" while understandable, doesn't directly translate "Verify Logout Requests Sign."  'Sign' is missing. A more accurate translation would incorporate a reference to the signature/signing aspect.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ຢືນຢັນການຮ້ອງຂໍອອກຈາກລະບົບທີ່ມີລາຍເຊັນ (Yuen yan kan hong kho ok chak rabop thi mi lai sen)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Verificēt atteikšanās pieprasījumu parakstīšanos' is overly literal and doesn't flow naturally in Latvian. 'Sign' refers to the cryptographic signature, not the act of signing.  'Verificēt' is correct for 'Verify', but the rest of the phrase is awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Izvēlēties precīzāku tulkojumu, piemēram, 'Pārbaudīt izrakstīšanās pieprasījuma parakstu' vai 'Apstiprināt izrakstīšanās pieprasījuma digitālo parakstu'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Verifieer Uitloggen Verzoek Ondertekening" is not the most natural or accurate translation of "Verify Logout Requests Sign".  While technically correct, it's a bit clunky.  'Sign' implies a signature, whereas the English phrase refers to the verification of the logout request itself.

The translation 'Zweryfikuj podpis żądań wylogowania' literally translates to 'Verify the signature of logout requests'. While technically correct, it's not the most natural or idiomatic way to express 'Verify Logout Requests Sign'. The term 'sign' in the original English refers to the request itself, not a digital signature.

The translation 'Sinal para Verificar Pedidos de Término de Sessão' doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'Verify Logout Requests Sign'. 'Sinal' (signal) doesn't fit the context. It should be something related to 'verification' or 'checking'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Verificar Solicitações de Encerramento de Sessão

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While grammatically correct, the suggested translation 'Verificar Solicitações de Encerramento de Sessão' could be more concise and natural. The phrase 'de Sessão' can be shortened.

The translation "Verifique o sinal de solicitação de logout" is not an accurate translation of "Verify Logout Requests Sign." It focuses on the 'sign' aspect and misses the broader concept of verifying logout requests. A more appropriate translation would emphasize the verification process itself.
The translated phrase is a bit clunky and could benefit from improved flow.

The translation "Verificarea semnăturii cu solicitarea de deconectare" is not an accurate translation of "Verify Logout Requests Sign".  "Solicitarea de deconectare" translates to "logout request," which is redundant with "sign" referring to a signature.

The English phrase "Verify Logout Requests Sign" is slightly awkward. A more natural translation would convey that the signatures on the logout requests are being verified. The current translation 'Проверять подпись запросов выхода' is technically correct but a bit literal and doesn't fully capture the intent.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Проверка подписи запросов выхода (or) Проверка сигнатур запросов выхода

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'Verify Logout Requests Sign' is not accurately translated. 'Sign' likely refers to the signature or authentication process, which is not conveyed in the Sinhala translation. A more accurate translation would emphasize verification of the logout request itself.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: නික්මීමේ ඉල්ලුම සත්‍යාපනය කරන්න (Nikmime illuma sathyapana karanna)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Kontrola podpisu žiadostí o odhlásenie' is a bit literal and doesn't fully capture the nuance of 'Verify Logout Requests Sign'. It emphasizes 'signature' which might not be the intended meaning. A more natural translation would focus on verification of the logout request itself.

The translation "Preveri zahteve za odjave" is a literal translation of 'Verify Logout Requests' but doesn't quite capture the intended meaning of 'Verify Logout Requests Sign'. 'Sign' implies a signature or authentication, which is missing from the Slovenian translation. A more accurate translation would include a reference to verification or authentication of the requests.

The translation 'Провера потписа захтева за одјављивање' is not the most natural or precise translation of 'Verify Logout Requests Sign'. While technically correct, 'Sign' in this context likely refers to a signature or digital signature. A more accurate translation would reflect that.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Провера потписа захтева за одјављивање (потписаних захтева)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "Verify Logout Requests Sign" is not accurately translated. "Sign" in this context likely refers to a digital signature or authentication signature, not just a 'sign' in the general sense. 'Provera potpisa' implies a signature check, which is closer to the intended meaning, but could be more precise.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Provera digitalnog potpisa zahteva za odjavljivanje

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Çıkış İsteklerini İmzasını Doğrula' is not a natural or accurate rendering of 'Verify Logout Requests Sign'. The word 'imzasını' (its signature) doesn't fit the meaning of 'sign' in this context, which refers to cryptographic signing.
The translation 'Xác minh yêu cầu đăng xuất' is too literal and doesn't fully capture the meaning of 'Verify Logout Requests Sign'. The 'Sign' component is missing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Xác minh yêu cầu đăng xuất có chữ ký
